param.name: projectXML
param.dialogReference:
The confinement project file, this is the XML file created when you created a Confinement Project, this will be located in the folder you chose.

If you had called your project Amazon and stored it in c:\MyProjects and had ticked the create folder check box then the project file will be located in c:MyProjects\Amazon\project.rs.xml

param.name: realizationName
param.dialogReference: A user friendly name given to the realization. This forces the tool to create the default output shapefile names which are stored in the output sub folders.

param.name: InputFCStreamNetwork
param.dialogReference:
The stream network in your project inputs sub-folder. This is the Shapefile copy created from your original network.

For example if your project is called Amazon then you locate this dataset in Amazon\Inputs\StreamNetwork\StreamNetworkxxx where xxx is 001 or greater.

Do not use input files from outside of the project!

param.name: InputValleyBottomPolygon
param.dialogReference:
The valley bottom dataset in your project inputs sub-folder. This is the Shapefile copy created from your original valley bottom dataset.

For example if your project is called Amazon then you locate this dataset in Amazon\Inputs\ValleyBottoms\ValleyBottomxxx where xxx is 001 or greater.

Do not use input files from outside of the project!

param.name: InputBankfullChannelPoly
param.dialogReference:
The Active channel polygon (i.e bankfull buffer) dataset in your project inputs sub-folder. This is the Shapefile copy created from your original channel polygon dataset.

For example if your project is called Amazon then you locate this dataset in Amazon\Inputs\ChannelPolygons\ChannelPolygonxxx where xxx is 001 or greater.

Do not use input files from outside of the project!

param.name: outputRawConfiningState
param.dialogReference: This is automatically set to "RawConfiningState.shp" when you set the confinement realization name.

param.name: fcOutputConfiningMargins
param.dialogReference: This is automatically set to "ConfiningMargins.shp" when you set the confinement realization name.

param.name: strTempWorkspace
param.dialogReference:
An optional parameter.Specifying a file geodatabase workspace will allow you to examine the intermmediate datasets.

If you do not set this then a default location will be used.
